body_html:
Many thanks @ebrevdo for the prompt response. My question was around the "side tracked" question in this thread: how do you efficiently execute training & val testing using queues in your training loop.
I was unable to get the intuition of your comments in this context (is it relevant, please)?

Currently i'm using tf.place_holder_with_default( training_dequeue, shape) method - ugly.
Details earlier in this thread link

Most thankful for any pointers.

body:
Many thanks @ebrevdo for the prompt response. My question was around the "side tracked" question in this thread: how do you efficiently execute training & val testing using queues in your training loop. 
I was unable to get the intuition of your comments in this context (is it relevant, please)?

Currently i'm using tf.place_holder_with_default( training_dequeue, shape) method - ugly.
Details earlier in this thread [link](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2514#issuecomment-223447983)

Most thankful for any pointers.
